channel.title: Admin can't see drops or trade window?
channel.description:
Well I've recently promoted one of my mods to a global moderator so he can ipban, and ipmute. One problem, he cannot trade anyone, or see any drops from any monsters. I tried every way I could possibly think to fix this. I searched every playerrights ==2, and every playerrights >=2.
I can't seem to find a solution, can anyone help? Thanks!

item.title: Admin can't see drops or trade window?
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
